trans-unit.source: Sign in to the <link><linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the <link><linkText>Azure portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Check out the <link><linkText>Free Trial</linkText><title></title></link> offer if you don't have a subscription yet.
trans-unit.target: Check out the <link><linkText>Free Trial</linkText><title></title></link> offer if you don't have a subscription yet.

trans-unit.source: On the command bar at the bottom of the window, click New.
trans-unit.target: On the command bar at the bottom of the window, click New.

trans-unit.source: Under Compute, click Virtual Machine, and then click From Gallery.
trans-unit.target: Under Compute, click Virtual Machine, and then click From Gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Navigate to From Gallery in the Command Bar</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Navigate to From Gallery in the Command Bar</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The first screen after this lets you Choose an Image for your virtual machine from the list of available images.
trans-unit.target: The first screen after this lets you Choose an Image for your virtual machine from the list of available images.

trans-unit.source: (The available images may differ depending on the subscription you're using.)
trans-unit.target: (The available images may differ depending on the subscription you're using.)

trans-unit.source: The second screen lets you pick a computer name, size, and administrative user name and password.
trans-unit.target: The second screen lets you pick a computer name, size, and administrative user name and password.

trans-unit.source: Use the tier and size required to run your app or workload.
trans-unit.target: Use the tier and size required to run your app or workload.

trans-unit.source: Here are some tips:
trans-unit.target: Here are some tips:

trans-unit.source: New User Name refers to the administrative account that you use to manage the server.
trans-unit.target: New User Name refers to the administrative account that you use to manage the server.

trans-unit.source: Create a unique password for this account and make sure to remember it.
trans-unit.target: Create a unique password for this account and make sure to remember it.

trans-unit.source: You'll need the user name and password to log on to the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: You'll need the user name and password to log on to the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine's size affects the cost of using it, as well as configuration options such as how many data disks you can attach.
trans-unit.target: A virtual machine's size affects the cost of using it, as well as configuration options such as how many data disks you can attach.

trans-unit.source: For details, see <link><linkText>Sizes for virtual machines</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For details, see <link><linkText>Sizes for virtual machines</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The third screen lets you configure resources for networking, storage, and availability.
trans-unit.target: The third screen lets you configure resources for networking, storage, and availability.

trans-unit.source: Here are some tips:
trans-unit.target: Here are some tips:

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Service DNS Name is the global DNS name that becomes part of the URI that's used to contact the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: The Cloud Service DNS Name is the global DNS name that becomes part of the URI that's used to contact the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: You'll need to come up with your own cloud service name because it must be unique in Azure.
trans-unit.target: You'll need to come up with your own cloud service name because it must be unique in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Cloud services are important for scenarios using <link><linkText>multiple virtual machines</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Cloud services are important for scenarios using <link><linkText>multiple virtual machines</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For Region/Affinity Group/Virtual Network, use a region that's appropriate to your location.
trans-unit.target: For Region/Affinity Group/Virtual Network, use a region that's appropriate to your location.

trans-unit.source: You can also choose to specify a virtual network instead.
trans-unit.target: You can also choose to specify a virtual network instead.

trans-unit.source: If you want a virtual machine to use a virtual network, you must specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: If you want a virtual machine to use a virtual network, you must specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: You can't join the virtual machine to a virtual network after you create the VM.
trans-unit.target: You can't join the virtual machine to a virtual network after you create the VM.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Azure Virtual Network Overview</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Azure Virtual Network Overview</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For details about configuring endpoints, see <link><linkText>How to Set Up Endpoints to a Virtual Machine</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For details about configuring endpoints, see <link><linkText>How to Set Up Endpoints to a Virtual Machine</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The fourth configuration screen lets you install the VM Agent and configure some of the available extensions.
trans-unit.target: The fourth configuration screen lets you install the VM Agent and configure some of the available extensions.

trans-unit.source: The VM agent provides the environment for you to install extensions that can help you interact with or manage the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: The VM agent provides the environment for you to install extensions that can help you interact with or manage the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: For details, see <link><linkText>About the VM agent and extensions</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For details, see <link><linkText>About the VM agent and extensions</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: After the virtual machine is created, the portal lists the new virtual machine under Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: After the virtual machine is created, the portal lists the new virtual machine under Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: The corresponding cloud service and storage account also are created and are listed in those sections.
trans-unit.target: The corresponding cloud service and storage account also are created and are listed in those sections.

trans-unit.source: Both the virtual machine and cloud service are started automatically and their status is listed as Running.
trans-unit.target: Both the virtual machine and cloud service are started automatically and their status is listed as Running.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure VM Agent and the endpoints of the virtual machine</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure VM Agent and the endpoints of the virtual machine</linkText>
